name: RESANS
tagline: REST services for analytics as a service
body:
RESANS (RESt ANalytics Services) is a REST API that provides data analysis and predictive modeling services as RESTful web services.

The [init] version will allow calls for performing standard time-series forecasting analysis on continuous data.
Analysis API's will be data and platform independent.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
